name: Juicer Machines, ECOSELF Cold Press Juicer with 4.35" Large Feed Chute Fit Whole Fruits and Vegetables, Easy to Clean, Masticating Juicer Self Feeding Effortless for Batch Juicing, High Juice Yield
about_this_item: Large Feed Chute & Compact Design：Our juicer machines upgraded 4.35" inch large feed chute and 40oz capacity is larger than normal, while the size is smaller. You can juice whole fruits and vegetables without chopping. Moreover, the slow juicer doesn't take up too much space on a kitchen counter, which fits for a small kitchen, and can be carried to any part of the kitchen easily.

Powerful Motor & Efficient High Yield：With a High-power motor, our cold press juicer separates the pulp from the juice well, providing you with better-tasting, purer juice. Cold press technology maximizes the retention of nutrients and reduces oxidation, extracting a high yield of vitamins for your satisfying juicing experience. Enjoy fruit and vegetable juices such as apple, carrot, orange, watermelon, ginger, celery, tomato and more!

Easy to Assemble & Clean：Our ECOSELF masticating juicier features a hopper & screen integrated design, which can be easily assembled and disassembled in minutes, and is also easy to clean. Except for the motor base, other parts can be quickly cleaned with water, with an included brush for a hassle-free cleanse.

One-button Operation & Safety Design：It is easy to operate with a simply rotating button. You can enjoy fresh juice with ease. And the reverse function helps prevent clogging. The juice maker will automatically stop working if the cover is open accidentally while juicing, which is safer for children.

Protection Service & Brand Story：We provide 24 months of Repair and Replacement Service. Get in touch with us whenever you need. We will reply to you within 24 hours. ECOSELF is committed to providing customers with better service and shopping experience.

Troubleshooting Steps：The juicer can only be powered on and work normally after it is fully assembled. Rotate hopper clockwise to align Guidemark with Lock symbol, then close the hopper cover, and ensure full assembly before powering up the juicer.

title: Easy Peasy!
content: I  was hesitant to get into juicing again.  My last juicer was a nightmare.  I cant say enough about the ease of use and clean up for this product.  The juice output is amazing and clean up is a breeze. I read the 1 star  reviews and very confused if they got the same product as I did?
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2024

title: Effortless Everyday Juicing！A Gift That Keeps On Giving!
content: I was excited to see a slow masticating juicer with a wide chute for inserting vegetables and fruit and hoped it would make the juicing process more efficient. Sadly, what I found was the vegetables, especially leafy ones like chard, simply got pushed to the side and were not pulled down  into the masticator. The plunger part only pushes directly down through the circular hole in the lid, so it is of no help. To press the plant matter down, the juicer must be turned off, lid opened, and then manually repositioned. Any time saved by stuffing the wide mouth feeding container is lost by having to scrape down the sides. This might be a fine juicer for just apples or carrots, but it is impractical for leafy greens. I returned it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2024
